extendedInfo.description: This is the Hangman game for the Romanian language. Besides the normal rules you are given new words until you make 5 mistakes. Every game is scored giving you the chance to beat your high-score.SPECIFICATIONS:- Guess the word with a maximum of 5 errors.- For every guessed word you receive a bonus and a chance to guess another one.- Scoring system for evaluating each performance.- Submit your score online and compete with others.- receive achievements by completing numerous challenges.- Lots of word categories- General stats about all your games- Multi-player option with a friend. Game type sudden death, first one to miss a word loses.- Use the game categories or enter your own words for your opponent.- Play against the clock.Keywords: spanzuratoare, spanzuratoarea, cioraneanu, romania, roman, romanian, hangman

reviews.title: Slab
reviews.comment: Descrierea nu are leg\304\203tur\304\203 cu solu\305\243ia \303\256n 80% din cazuri. Plus c\304\203 nu se vede deloc bine pe rezolu\305\243ia tel meu (htc sensation + ICS). Variantele mai vechi erau mult mai bune. Nerecomandat

reviews.comment: Foarte interesanta aplicatia! N-am intalnit greseli, iar eu sunt de parere ca  dificultatea este ideala. Mai exact este o aplicatie bine pusa la punct.

reviews.title: Sugestie
reviews.comment: Ar fi bine ca undeva sub liniutele de completat sa ni se spuna din cate litere este cuvantul, k sa nu mai stam sa numaram liniutele mici. Am castiga ceva timp. In rest, multumim frumos. Super aplicatie!

reviews.title: Idee
reviews.comment: Jocul e super, dar piramida si paralelipipedul nu sunt forme ci corpuri geometrice. Alte greseli nu am observat..

reviews.title: Mesaj
reviews.comment: Cu reclamele in joc sunt perfect de acord. Dar de ce primesc notific\304\203ri f\304\203r\304\203 s\304\203 fiu logat pe jocul \304\203sta?! Scam.  UNINSTAL!
